page.title: 06Religion in Twyford
page.content: There are two Parish Churches in our block.Twyford church which is one of a group of 7 churches making up the Swan Group.The Group share 2 ministers who live outside our block.The small church at Godington is in an Oxfordshire Group.Both churches are poorly attended except on special occasions e.g.Christmas,weddings or funerals.Twyford also has a Non-Conformist chapel which shares a minister with other villages. A small number of people attend breakaway churches such as Latterday Saints,Plymouth Bretheren.A small number attend a Catholic church in a nearby town. We would say almost 100% of the people claim to belong to a Christian faith although only a few percent attend church regularly.
